Content: In order to keep Army troops serving the SFHQ-West educated on the spread of ‘Coronavirus’, Security Force Headquarters - West (SFHQ-West), Panagoda took steps to educate the troops on the fast spreading virus during a workshop held at SFHQ-West on Wednesday (5). Lieutenant Colonel R.K.P Pushpakumara, Commanding Officer, Panagoda Army Base Hospital at the invitation of the SFHQ-West delivered the lecture to this effect. It was held at the Sri Lanka Signal Corps auditorium at Panagoda.
